Text.Name: Item_SpellPaper
Text.Desc: Specially-made paper that can be turned into Talisman by drawing a specific symbol with Cinnabar on the its surface through one's mind power.

Text.Name: Item_SpellPaperLv2
Text.Desc: Paper made from Beast blood that can be turned into Talisman by drawing a specific symbol with Cinnabar on the its surface through one's mind power.

Text.Name: Item_SpellPaperLv3
Text.Desc: Talisman created with a Serenity Soul Gem. It was turned into Talisman by drawing a specific symbol with Cinnabar on the its surface through one's mind power.

Text.Name: Item_Spell
Text.Desc: A successfully-made Talisman, wearing it grants certain ability bonuses.

Text.Name: Item_SpellLv2
Text.Desc: A successfully-made Talisman, wearing it grants certain ability bonuses.

Text.Name: Item_SpellLv3
Text.Desc: A successfully-made Talisman, wearing it grants certain ability bonuses.
